sections.title: APPENDIX A: Operations and Maintenance Manual Approval
sections.content:
The undersigned acknowledge they have reviewed the <Project Name> Operations and Maintenance Manual and agree with the approach it presents. Changes to this manual will be coordinated with and approved by the undersigned or their designated representatives.
